segments.text: Do you have the five dollars I lent you yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh I forgot ! I'll run home real quickly and bring you the money .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You don't have to go right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd hate for you to think I was lazy in returning your money .
segments.speaker: S2
